me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.zones

Class ZoneProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.zones.ZoneProcessor

  • public class ZoneProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    A ZoneProcessor is responsible for dealing with Zone objects, allowing you to do some pretty cool stuff. Unfortunately, I still can't juggle chainsaws (which is incredibly cool), but you wanna know what's just as cool? A ZoneProcessor.

    Ever wanted to have your robot perform some certain action automatically? Well, of course you have. But have you ever wanted your robot to perform something automatically as soon as it enters (or exits) (or is inside) a certain area?

    ZoneProcessor is operated by using the update(Pathfinder) method. It should accept the instance of Pathfinder that you're using as a parameter. With that, it'll do magical stuff... basically.

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson

    • Method Detail

      • addZone

        public void addZone(java.lang.String name,
                    Zone zone)
        Add a zone to collection of zones the processor is handling.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the zone. This name will be needed if you're planning on removing the zone or referencing it at some point. This is also used for getting a list of names of zones.
        zone - the zone.

      • removeZone

        public void removeZone(java.lang.String name)
        Remove a zone based on the zone's name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the zone to remove.

      • getContainingZones

        public java.util.List<Zone> getContainingZones(PointXY point)
        Get a list of zones that contain the provided point.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to test.
        Returns:
        a list of zones that contain the provided point.

      • getNonContainingZones

        public java.util.List<Zone> getNonContainingZones(PointXY point)
        Get a list of zones that do not contain the provided point.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to test.
        Returns:
        a list of zones that do not contain the provided point.

      • update

        public void update(Pathfinder pathfinder)
        Based on the provided point, call the correct methods of each of the zones.
        • If the robot has ENTERED the zone (previously, it was not in the zone, but now it is), the zone's Zone.onEnter(Pathfinder) method will be called.
        • If the robot has EXITED the zone (previously, it was in the zone, but now it is not), the zone's Zone.onExit(Pathfinder) method will be called.
        • If the robot is INSIDE the zone (this will be activated every time the onEnter method is called, as well as whenever the robot is inside the zone), the zone's Zone.whileInside(Pathfinder) method will be called.
        Parameters:
        pathfinder - the instance of Pathfinder.
